events.message: I ordered a jacket last week and I want to return it because it does not fit. How can I get my money back quickly?
The case was categorized under Refund after detecting keywords related to returning the product and requesting a refund.
Support agent Sarah has been assigned to handle this refund request for the returned jacket.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. Iâ€™m here to assist you with your jacket return and refund process.
Could you please provide the order number and confirm if the jacket is unused and in the original packaging?
The order number is 1234567890. The jacket is unused and still in its original packaging, unopened.
Thank you for the details. You can ship the jacket back using our prepaid return label. Once we receive it, we will process your full refund within 5 business days.
That sounds great. I appreciate the quick response and clarity on the refund timeline.
The return process has been initiated. Please use the provided label to ship the jacket back, and we will complete your refund promptly.
We wanted to check if you received the refund for your returned jacket. Please let us know if everything went smoothly.
Yes, I received the refund today. Thank you for handling this so efficiently.
We are closing this case now. Thank you for your cooperation, and we hope to serve you again in the future.
We have sent you a brief survey to rate your satisfaction with our refund service. Your feedback is very important to us.
